thread.title: Obama urges supporters to stay engaged, says he will too

title: Obama urges supporters to stay engaged, says he will too
text:
> Entertainment Obama urges supporters to stay engaged, says he will too Basketball player Stephen Curry, center, with his teammates from the Golden State Warriors on stage with the 2015 NBA championship trophy during a Democratic fundraiser at the Warfield Theater, Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015 in San Francisco.
